content: red hat of resistance sizes available child 19 inches adult 22 inches length from cast-on edge to approximately 8 11 inches tip not including i-cord gauge 10 stitches and 15 row = 4 x 4 inches in stockinette stitch needles 10 0mm us 15 circulars/dpn s or any size to achieve gauge materials ~1 skein of loops & threads charisma - bulky 5 pattern this chunky hat is worked in the round from the brim to tip and knits up very quickly making it easy to make many in a short time i recommend starting with the german-twisted cast on to keep the hat snug while giving a little bit of stretch i used the magic loop method to knit this hat cast on and cuff cast on 36 44 stitches onto circular or double-pointed needles and join in the round be careful not to twist stitches pm at the beginning of the round work rounds 1- 5 6 in k1p1 ribbing about 1 75 2 work 8 15 rounds of stockinette the hat should measure 4 25 6 from the cast-on edge setting up for decreases round 14 21 knit 18 22 pm knit to end of round decreases round 1 *k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before marker k2tog k1* sm repeat from *to* once more 4 stitches have been decreased round 2 knit around repeat these two row until there are 8 stitches left on needles last two rounds k2tog around 4 stitches remaining k2 k2tog 3 stitches remaining work 2 3 of i-cord then knit all three stitches together and leave a long tail to attach a tassel abbreviations k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 stitches together right leaning decrease ssk slip slip knit left leaning decrease pm place marker
